title: Welcome to my website.
text:
Office C35, Sir Clive Granger Building, The University of Nottingham, Nottingham, England, United Kingdom
E-mail: lexjs19@nottingham.ac.uk , juanpascampos@gmail.com






I am a PhD student in Economics at the University of Nottingham. Before beginning my doctoral studies, I worked at several international institutions, including the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB), and the Latin American Reserve Fund (FLAR).


Research Interests
Main: Applied and theoretical labour economics.
Secondary: Macroeconomics.
